author: hwright
msg: Revert part of an accidental commit in r25305.

author: hwright
msg: Checkpoint commit in the reworking of the 'svn log -g' implemenation.
This fleshes out some of my ideas regarding log message trees, and how to
generate them.  Most of the diff is moving code in to separate helper functions.
The code does not generate the trees (beyond the first level), or correctly
[Changes to subversion/tests/cmdline/svntest/main.py were reverted in r25306.]
(build_log_tree): ...to this.  Factor out log message generation and sending
of the log trees, and iterate over child revisions to build a tree.

author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: Another follow-up to r25291, passing merge range fields in the
notification info data structure from C-land into Java-landia.
Add a new RevisionRange class, currently housing code to convert
that's part of a notification into its Java RevisionRange
equivalent.  Rename its jobject variable from "jmergeRange" to
"jMergeRange" for consistency with the naming convention applied to
other local variables in this method.
(testBasicMerge): Add a merge_begin notification handler, and verify
the results for both dry-run and actual merges.

author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: A bug fix follow-up to r25291, actually storing changelist
name and merge range fields in the notification info data structure.

author: sussman
msg: During a merge, display ranges as "rX through rY".
(notify):  tweak display of revision range being merged.
(merge_notify_line):  make tests expect the new syntax.
